sn_aia_usecase.base_plan: This team can interact with IT liaisons to find an application that the end user wants to create a playbook for. Only one step is required to fulfill the given task: 1. Find the factory application built by the requested item provided <req_id> 2. Get a list of services from the application and have the user select one of them to build a playbook for
sn_aia_usecase.description: Aid an IT liaison in taking steps to create a set of agent instructions for a given case and building those instructions into a playbook.
sn_aia_usecase.name: Digital Product Factory Playbook Assista
